tables.name: valsi
tables.schema: ++id, bangu, w, y, d, n, t, *s, g, *r, *cache, [r+bangu]

rows.w: lo nanmu cu mleca mi lo ka renvi fi lo xo kau da
rows.d: He is younger than I.

rows.w: lo nanmu cu zmadu mi lo ka se bruna lo xo kau da
rows.d: He has more brothers than I.

rows.w: mi mleca do lo ka se bruna lo xo kau da
rows.d: I have fewer brothers than you.

rows.w: lo nanmu cu zmadu mi lo ka pinxe lo xo kau djacu
rows.d: He drinks more water than I.

rows.w: mi mleca lo nanmu lo ka pinxe lo xo kau djacu
rows.d: I drink less water than him.

rows.w: lo nanmu cu dunli do lo ka kanro
rows.d: He is as well as you.

rows.w: so'a da zo'u lo karce pe do lo karce pe mi cu dunli lo ka za da va xo kau de muvdu
rows.d: Your car is as fast as mine.

rows.w: pu raiksi lo ka se entuzi vau lo te jivna poi mi pu'i zgana
rows.d: It was the most exciting match I've ever seen.

rows.w: ma raiksi lo ka condi vau lo lalxu jo'u lo bra-xamsi
rows.d: Which is deeper a lake or an ocean?

rows.w: ma raiksi lo ka sutra vau lo trene jo'u lo aftobuso
rows.d: Which is faster a train or a bus?

rows.w: lo nanmu cu mleca mi lo ka clani
rows.d: He is not as tall as I am.

rows.w: mi nelci lo nu mi klama ne se mau lo nu mi stali
rows.d: I prefer to go rather than to stay.

rows.w: mutce xamgu fa lo nu za'u re'u jai zu'e tirna lo vreji be la pa moi ctu-fau
rows.d: It is very useful to listen to Lesson One again.

rows.w: tcika lo nu ei zgana lo se tivni
rows.d: It's time to watch TV.

rows.w: da'i na cumki fa lo nu skicu ro nabmi
rows.d: It would be quite impossible to enumerate all the obstacles.

rows.w: sarcu fa lo nu lo nakni ba ti zi se benji fi tu
rows.d: It is necessary that he should be sent there at once.

rows.w: fau lo nu do klama tu vau do zva-fa'i lo nakni
rows.d: If you go there, you will find him.

rows.w: fau lo nu la'a nai do klama tu vau do zva-fa'i lo nakni
rows.d: If you went there, you would find him.

rows.w: da'i pu ku fau lo nu do klama tu vau do zva-fa'i lo nakni
rows.d: If you had gone there, you would have found him.

rows.w: mi na krici i jo nai mi lo se go'i cu viska gi'e ganse fi lo ka se kanla
rows.d: I won't believe it unless I see it with my own eyes.

rows.w: au da'i mi cipni
rows.d: I wish I were a bird.

rows.w: au da'i mi penmi lo nakni famti be mi ca lo pru-lam-dei
rows.d: I wish I had met my uncle yesterday.

rows.w: au mi ka'e ku klama gi'e vitke lo fetsi famti be mi ca lo bav-lam-dei
rows.d: I wish I could go and visit my aunt tomorrow.

rows.w: ta'a u'u do
rows.d: I'm sorry to interrupt you.

rows.w: mi ckaji lo ka pa taksi ca'o se jai se denpa bu'u lo bartu
rows.d: I've got a taxi waiting outside.

rows.w: mi pacna lo nu ba na nandu do fa lo ka jimpe gi'e morji
rows.d: I hope you won't find it all too difficult to understand and to remember.

rows.w: au mi ka'e tavla do lo larcu
rows.d: I wish I could talk to you about art.

rows.w: ma se stuzi lo tcana pe lo aftobuso pe li mu
rows.d: Where is the stop of bus number 5?

rows.w: lo aftobuso pe li xo cu muvdu lo muzga
rows.d: What's the number of the bus that goes to the museum?

rows.w: lo aftobuso be loi litru cu clani
rows.d: The tourists' bus is long.

rows.w: gau ko ta to'e akti
rows.d: Turn that off.

rows.w: gau ko ta akti
rows.d: Turn it on.

rows.w: mi ba jai gau akti fai lo minji
rows.d: I will get the machine running.

rows.w: lo pa zarci ca akti
rows.d: The shop is open.

rows.w: lo minji ca akti lo ka cupra lo purmo
rows.d: The machine is now in operation producing flour.

rows.w: xu do terpa tu'a lo ankabuta
rows.d: Are you afraid of spiders?

rows.w: ti noi arte cu pu jai rinka so'i nu darlu
rows.d: There've been a lot of debates caused by this artwork.

rows.w: pa arxokuna cu zvati lo mi kumfa pe lo'e nu jukpa
rows.d: There's a raccoon in my kitchen.

rows.w: mi pu tol-ckire lo ninmu lo ka tarti lo xlali
rows.d: I felt resentful of this lady's bad behavior.

rows.w: ra co'a se asna pa jai ckape vi lo barda fenra
rows.d: He took a dangerous pose near the abyss.

rows.w: ko na bacru su'o cladu
rows.d: Don't talk loud.

rows.w: ma jdima loi badna poi kilto lo grake
rows.d: How much is the kilo of bananas?

rows.w: mi pu badri lo nu mi pu e'ande lo fetsi lo ka zukte
rows.d: I was sad that I had allowed her to do it.

rows.w: mi bajra vi'i lo mitre be li ci ki'o
rows.d: I ran three thousands meters.

rows.w: xu do su'o roi senva lo nu do bajra lo jdika grana loi xance be do
rows.d: Have you ever dreamt of running on your hands on a narrow rod?

rows.w: ti bakfu lo se dunda lo dasri
rows.d: This is a gift packed with a ribbon into a bundle.

rows.w: mu bakni cu zvati lo purdi
rows.d: There are five cows in the garden.

rows.w: mi xebni lo'e bakri i ki'u bo ri punji lo'e purmo lo xance
rows.d: I hate chalk. It leaves powder on hands.

rows.w: ko bevri lo baktu be lo festi fo lo dinju
rows.d: Take the pail of bucket out of the house.

rows.w: ra pu sombo pa balji be pa xrula lo purdi
rows.d: She planted a flower bulb in the garden.

rows.w: loi litru ca'o zgana lo melbi nu muvdu fa lo balnema
rows.d: The tourists are watching the graceful movement of a baleen whale.

rows.w: mi cpana lo balni be lo zdani be mi
rows.d: I am on the balcony of my home.

rows.w: lo jvinu be fi lo balni cu melbi
rows.d: The view from the balcony is beautiful.

rows.w: lo balre be lo dakfu cu kinli
rows.d: The blade of the knife is sharp.

rows.w: la kevin co'u zvati i je lo nu go'i cu pu balvi lo nu ju'a mi mo'u klama lo xotli
rows.d: Kevin left, and that happened after my arrival to the hotel.

rows.w: lo nixli cu nelci tu noi bambola
rows.d: The girl likes that doll.

rows.w: lo bambu cu torni lo brife
rows.d: The bamboo bends before the wind.

rows.w: pa lalxu cu bancu lo tcadu
rows.d: There is a lake beyond the city.

rows.w: lo tai fasnu cu bancu lo se kakne be mi
rows.d: Such things are beyond my powers.

rows.w: lo zdani cu bancu lo vu tricu ti lo ka darno ti
rows.d: The house is beyond those trees from here in how far it is from here.

rows.w: lo nu brife e lo nu carvi cu bandu lo dinju lo nu ri jelca
rows.d: Wind and rain protect the house from burning.

rows.w: lo remna cu simsa lo banfi lo ka se tarmi
rows.d: Humans look like amphibians.

rows.w: xu do se bangu la lojban
rows.d: Do you speak Lojban?

rows.w: lo jvinu be lo xamsi bei lo kumfa be lo xotli cu banli lo ka se tarmi
rows.d: The view of the sea from the hotel room is magnificent i its form.

rows.w: lo spati ca'o banro lo tricu pa se katna jimca
rows.d: The plant is growing into a tree from a cut off branch.

rows.w: ti banxa lo gugde lo ka canja fo lo kagni i je to'u ti banxa fi tu'a lo kagni
rows.d: This bank owned by state works with companies, in short, this is a commercial bank.

rows.w: lo tcima pu bapli lo nu lo nakni cu stali lo zdani
rows.d: The violent weather forced him to stay at home.

rows.w: lo snuti pu bapli lo nu lo prenu cu zenba lo ka jundi
rows.d: The accident convinced him to be more careful.

rows.w: lo tanxe pu barda lo ka se canlu
rows.d: The box occupied large space.

rows.w: lo nu penmi cu pu barda lo ka se ditcu
rows.d: The meeting lasted for a large amount of time.

rows.w: loi tricu cu bargu lo dargu
rows.d: The trees form an arch over the road.

rows.w: ti barja lo ckafi lo'e litru
rows.d: This is a bar serving coffee to tourists.

rows.w: lo barna be lo kamju cu tcita lo dargu tu'a lo flalu
rows.d: The mark on the pillar is a road sign.

rows.w: ei mi klama lo bartu be lo zdani
rows.d: I should go out.

rows.w: mi pu basna lo nu lo nu ca'o gunka cu vajni vau lo ka cladu cusku
rows.d: I emphasized the importance of continuing to work by saying it aloud.

rows.w: ma ba basti do lo ka gunka
rows.d: Who will replace you?

rows.w: pu ku pa gerku cu batci lo tuple be mi
rows.d: A dog bit my leg.

rows.w: ra pu ru'i jgari pa batke be lo kosta pe vo'a
rows.d: He was holding a button of his coat.

rows.w: lo'e bavmi cu ralju se cupra bu'u
rows.d: Barley is the main product here.

rows.w: ko na bebna lo ka ce'u da ca'o cusku
rows.d: Don't be silly in repeating the same.

rows.w: lo bekpi be mi za'o se cortu
rows.d: My back still hurts.

rows.w: mi cmima lo'i stati prenu ku noi se bende pa da la robin lo nu ro cmima be lo se nei cu tadni la lojban
rows.d: I am a member of a team of smart people led by Robin and learning Lojban.

rows.w: mi ba benji pa xatra do fu la internet fo lo skami pe lo mi zdani
rows.d: I will send you a letter via the internet from my home computer.

rows.w: pa gunka pu benji pa sance sinxa pa drata gunka lo galtu lo vacri
rows.d: A worker sent a sound signal to another worker from the above over the air.

rows.w: mi se bersa re da
rows.d: I have two sons.

rows.w: lo za'u pa purdi be fi lo'e grute cu berti lo tcadu
rows.d: Fruit gardens are to the north of the city.

rows.w: ro remna su'o da se besna
rows.d: All humans have brains.

rows.w: lo betfu be mi cu se cortu
rows.d: My belly hurts.

rows.w: ti na ciblu gi'e ja'a betka
rows.d: It's not blood. It's beet.

rows.w: pu betri lo nakni fa lo nu ri co'u se bersa lo ro pa mei
rows.d: It was a tragedy for him to lose his only son.

rows.w: mi ralte lo cidja ca ro nu mi litru
rows.d: I carry food whenever I travel.

rows.w: mi pu bevri pa patxu be lo nudle fu'e ta'o fi lo purdi fo lo kumfa pe lo'e nu jukpa vau fu lo rokci dargu fu'o
rows.d: I carried a bowl of noodles (to the garden from the kitchen via a rocky road).

rows.w: la kevin pu bevri pa gerku lo zdani
rows.d: Kevin brought a dog home.

rows.w: mi pu bevri pa fonxa fo pa daski
rows.d: I took a phone out of a pocket.

rows.w: pu ku mu bidju ti zvati
rows.d: There were five pebbles here.

rows.w: lo bifce cu vofli vi loi xrula
rows.d: Bees are flying near the flowers.

rows.w: lo carvi pu bikla ta'i lo nu ri janli lo canko
rows.d: The rain whipped against the window.

rows.w: mi bilga lo ka bevri ti noi cukta vau lo ponse ca lo cab-dei vau lo pu se nupre be mi
rows.d: I must take this book to the owner today fulfilling my earlier promise.

rows.w: ra pu terpa lo nu vo'a co'a bilma fi la zukam
rows.d: She was afraid to catch a cold.

rows.w: mi bilma lo ka cortu lo denci vau lo influ'enza
rows.d: I've got the flu and my teeth hurt.

rows.w: lo kagni cu binra lo sportivo lo'e xrani lo ka pleji lo jdini
rows.d: The company insures the sportsman against injuries by paying money as an insurance.

rows.w: lo tsiju ba zi binxo lo tricu
rows.d: The seed soon will turn into a tree.

rows.w: e'o do smaji
rows.d: Please, be quiet.

rows.w: lo pezli be lo bi'orka co'a pelxu
rows.d: The birch leaves have turned yellow.

rows.w: ti birje lo'e badna
rows.d: This is banana beer.

rows.w: ra pu jai se torni pa birka be mi
rows.d: She twisted my arm.

rows.w: mi birti lo du'u do ba snada
rows.d: I am sure you will succeed.

rows.w: xu do pu'i jai gau birti fai loi rirni be do lo du'u lo nu litru na ckape
rows.d: Have you persuaded your parents that the journey wouldn't be dangerous?

rows.w: au mi viska lo bisli cmana
rows.d: I'd like to see ice mountains.

rows.w: lo bitmu be lo purdi bei lo foldi cu rotsu
rows.d: The fence between the garden and the field is thick.

rows.w: pa me ti noi bitmu lo malsi cu sinxa lo pu nu lo gugde cu vlipa
rows.d: One of these walls of the temple is a sign of the past power of the country.

rows.w: lo vreji cu bitni li pa ki'o
rows.d: The file is 1000 bit.

rows.w: loi denci be lo fetsi pu blabi
rows.d: Her teeth were white.

rows.w: lo kabri cu blaci
rows.d: The cup is made of glass.

rows.w: lo tsani cu blanu ca lo cab-dei
rows.d: The sky is blue today.

rows.w: lo'e blato cu mipri lo nei ca lo'e donri
rows.d: Cockroaches hide themselves during daytime.

rows.w: lo dinju cu te zbasu lo rokci bliku
rows.d: The house is built of stone blocks.

rows.w: pa blondine nixli pu mo'u klama te zu'e lo nu vo'a penmi do
rows.d: A girl with blond hair arrived to meet you.

rows.w: doi la alis ma traji lo ka do nelci vau fo lo'e blondine ce lo'e brunete
rows.d: Alice, whom do you like more, blondes or brunets?

rows.w: mi pu se marce pa bloti be lo'e prenu bei pa te falnu
rows.d: I was a passenger on a sailboat for carrying people.

rows.w: lo bolci pu gunro fe'e co'u lo flu'ente
rows.d: The ball rolled into the stream.

rows.w: lo bombila cu spofu
rows.d: The light bulb is broken.

rows.w: mi pu jai gau janli fai pa grana lo bongu be lo ka sarji lo tuple be mi
rows.d: I hit my leg bone with a stick.

rows.w: ti boske lo clani tricu jo'u lo kliti dertu
rows.d: This is a forest of long trees and clay loams.

rows.w: ti botpi lo'e birje lo blaci lo pa xunre
rows.d: This is a bottle of beer made of glass and having a red lid.

rows.w: mi ba bevri pa boxfo do
rows.d: I will bring you a blanket.

rows.w: pu ku pa da barda boxna lo xamsi
rows.d: There was a big wave in the sea.

rows.w: lo tance be mi mi bradi lo nu mi troci lo ka pilno lo nei lo ka bacru lo lojbo valsi
rows.d: My tongue is my enemy when I'm trying to use it to utter Lojban words.

rows.w: lo nu lo bratu be lo snime cu carvi cu pu vlile
rows.d: The precipitation of sleet was violent.

rows.w: mi bredi lo ka kansa do lo ka cadzu
rows.d: I am ready to walk with you.

rows.w: lu ma nuzba li'u bri-sni
rows.d: "What's up?" is a grammatical clause.

rows.w: lu mi dunda ti do cu bri-sni zo dunda zo mi ce'o zo ti ce'o zo do
rows.d: "I give this to you." is a clause with the main verb "give" that has sequential places "I","this","you".

rows.w: lo du'u mi dunda ti do cu bridi lo ka dunda vau mi ce'o ti ce'o do
rows.d: That I give this to you is a relationship between the property of giving and the sequence of me, this and you.

rows.w: oi lo brife be lo'e berti se la'u li du'e carmi
rows.d: Oh, the northern wind is too strong.

rows.w: ti briju lo mikce lo tcadu
rows.d: This is the doctor's city office.

rows.w: mi pu klama cei broda lo zarci i ba bo mi ze'a sipna i xu do ba broda
rows.d: I went to the market, and then I slept. Will you go to the market?

rows.w: la alis mo'u citka cei brode pa plise i je la kevin mo'u brode
rows.d: Alice has eaten up an apple. And Kevin ate an apple too.

rows.w: la alis mo'u citka cei brode pa perli i je la kevin mo'u brode
rows.d: Alice has eaten up an pear. And Kevin ate an pear too.

rows.w: la alis pu ca'o ku zgana cei brodi lo pixra i mi na brodi
rows.d: Alice was beholding the pictures. I wasn't.

rows.w: ma pu renro cei brodo lo rokci i mu'a mi pu na brodo
rows.d: Who threw the rock? For example, I didn't.

rows.w: ti gusta lo se nelci be mi cei brodu i ku'i lo ji'a mamta be mi ta'e zbasu lo cidja poi brodu
rows.d: This restaurant serves the food that I like. However, my mother as well makes food that I like.

rows.w: do bruna mi lo ka se mamta
rows.d: You are my brother since we are born from the same mother.

rows.w: xu do budjo
rows.d: Are you a Buddhist?

rows.w: lo bukpu cu cpana lo jubme
rows.d: The cloth is on the table.

rows.w: lo xamsi cu bumru loi lenku dirgo
rows.d: The sea is covered by a fog of cold drops.

rows.w: ti noi tanxe cu bunda li pa no lo'e glico
rows.d: This box is 10 Engish pounds in weight.

rows.w: lo bunre gerku pu zva-fa'i pa blabi ractu
rows.d: The brown dog found a white rabbit.

rows.w: ti burcu lo nu punji lo cinta vau loi cmalu
rows.d: This is a brush for painting with small bristles.

rows.w: xu do burna lo nu do pilno la lojban
rows.d: Are you disconcerted of using Lojban?

rows.w: so'i roi ku lo xamgu fasnu cu cabna lo xlali fasnu
rows.d: Good events often happen at the same time as bad events.

rows.w: ti cabra lo ka zalvi lo gurni vau lo xance
rows.d: This is a hand-controlled machine for grinding grain.

rows.w: ti minji lo ka cpacu loi djacu
rows.d: This is an automated apparatus for getting water.
